entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
